reviewText: No wonder this is not distributed in USA and hard to find in non-PAL version. Listed as Region 1 and 4, it did take a moment to play in my Sony, but it did play w/o having to resort to computer--had to hit NEXT to get past promo. Spanish subtitles DO turn off so you can have English and built in subtitles for native African dialogue.
Hey, I missed an important part (Is doesn't work on products made here)!  I played wondefully in my computer though, but would much rather pla it on my "73 television.
